mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(no,id,pwd,name,phone,birth) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM member), #{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{phone},#{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id,pwd,name,phone,birth,no FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id FROM member WHERE name=#{name} and phone=#{phone} and birth=#{birth}
SELECT pwd FROM member WHERE name=#{name} AND id=#{id} AND phone=#{phone}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
